description:
Location: Austin/Dallas (Central Region) or

New York/New Jersey (Eastern Region) or

Chicago (Mid-West Region) or

Seattle/San Jose (Western Region).

Job Description:

Experience: Minimum 10+ years

We are looking for a quota-carrying Director/Sr. Sales Directors who will be responsible for leading sales activities in his/her respective region focused on enterprises in Financial Services or Manufacturing or Logistics or Automotive. This is a “hunter” position as an individual contributor and will report to a North American sales leader located in San Jose. Activities include lead generation towards hunting new enterprise logos, identifying opportunities, and closing the same.

Enterprise Digital business is Innominds emerging business offering and has a quite vast ecosystem of technologies such as Digital Experience, Application Modernization, UX & UI, Cloud/DevOps, QA/Automation, IoT, micro-services, AI & ML, RPA, Big Data, and Data Science. The candidate is expected to have exposure to and understanding of most of these emerging technologies. Key to the role is to map the core offerings of Innominds; Devices, Applications, and Analytics story to customers for their Digital Transformation journey and make Innominds service offering relevant for prospect’s Business Transformation initiatives.

Responsibilities:

Director responsibilities include targeting the right segment of prospects, grow the quality pipeline, winning profitable deals, and managing sales activities to create mutually beneficial, trust-based relationships that create value. Develop relationships with key buyers and decision-makers, CXOs, and LOB heads at new prospects and grow the business. Act as point of contact for resolution and escalation of all key items with the client and internal POC’s/decision makers.
• Focus on growing Sales pipeline 4 quarters out to ensure adequate opportunity coverage to targets for short-term and long-term, run rate and revenue growth.
• Drive to achieve quarterly and yearly sales targets to support both TCV and ACV targets to drive business growth.
• Identify new business solutions by researching Must Have Accounts including mapping company’s organizational structure, identifying new opportunities, and understanding the key business drivers and competitive landscape.
• Collaborate with technical and solutions teams and present offerings/solutions to target enterprise prospects/customers
• Anchor client meetings and pursue any opportunities generated with the help of pre-sales, partner units, and external partners.
• Provides accurate sales forecasts to management on a weekly, monthly, and quarterly basis using the CRM systems.
• Build Excellent Relationships with Customers.

Requirements

Hygiene:(Basic)

1. Prior experience in selling digital engineering, product development, and product support offerings to Enterprise Technology or Enterprises.

2. Exceptional communication skills with analytical problem-solving and good client-need-assessment aptitude and make consultative sales to CXOs and LBO heads.

3. Experience with shaping, solutions, and negotiating large complex, creative, and innovative outsourcing and transformation deals.

8. 10 years with progressively increasing sales responsibility with a Proven history of consistently over-achieving sales quotas.

9. Hustler who believes in getting things done both internally and for the customer

10. Enjoy traveling 80% of the time and being in front of prospects and customers.

11. Bachelor / Master’s degree

Sweet Spot: (Preferred)

1. Hunting Experiences in selling IT/Product Engineering Services and familiar with a spectrum of offerings with Devices, Applications, and Analytics.

2. Understands and is Passionate about Digital Transformation, Industry 4.0, new age technologies and excited about the future that technology is shaping – Cloud/DevOps, IoT, Artificial Intelligence, AI & ML, and Blockchain for various business verticals.

3. Experience as a consulting manager in a top-tier management consulting firm OR Full Life Cycle Product Engineering services firm.

4. Proven Hunting experience of 10 years with an IT Outsourcing Service provider chasing enterprise clients in Financial Services or Manufacturing or Logistics or Automotive verticals.

“Innominds is an Equal Opportunity Employer and prohibits discrimination and harassment of any kind.”
